DOC.brief_summary: Randomized study . Patients coronary artery disease equivalent randomize receive atorvastatin 40 mg/day + placebo vs. atorvastatin 40 mg/day + ezetimibe 40 mg/day . Oxidized LDL cholesterol measure baseline 8 week treatment . Hypothesis ezetimibe low oxidize LDL
DOC.brief_title: Effect Ezetimibe Oxidized Low-density Lipoprotein ( LDL ) Cholesterol
DOC.criteria: CAD CAD equivalent Prior CABG PCI within 3 month Prior use ezetimibe within 3 month Receiving atorvastatin 40 mg/day 80 mg/day dose rosuvastatin CHF NYHA stage > 2 Creatinin clearance < 30 ml/min
